trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.
Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow.
A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a theme defined for a specific workflow.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that describes default values for the look and feel of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
Creates a duplicate theme.
Use `Clone` to create a duplicate theme with property settings that match the cloning theme.
An object that represents the newly-cloned theme.
Gets the directory part of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath"></xref>.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ContainingFileDirectory%2A> to get the directory part of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A>.
The directory part of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath"></xref>.
Creates a standard theme.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CreateStandardTheme%2A> to create a new theme available anyone who uses the workflow designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType"></xref> of the standard theme to create.
The newly created <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current theme.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> to make changes to the theme used to display the workflow.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> that is used for display settings.
Gets or sets the description of the theme.
The description of the theme.
The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
Gets a list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.DesignerThemes%2A> to retrieve a list of designer themes that are associated with the workflow.
A list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable change notification.
Enabling change notification causes the theme changed events to occur when changes to the theme are made.
`true` to enable change notification; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the file path for the theme.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A> represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
The file path for the theme.
The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
When overridden in a derived class, allows an object to clean up any resources deterministically.
This method cleans up resources by calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>(`false`).
Override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> to customize the cleanup.
Generates a file path for the theme.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GenerateThemeFilePath%2A> to create a unique file path for the theme.
A new, unique file path for the theme.
Gets the theme for the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GetDesignerTheme%2A> to retrieve the theme associated with a specified activity designer.
The activity designer from which to retrieve the theme.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Loads a new theme from the specified path using a serialization manager.
If your theme requires custom serialization, use this method to load your method using your custom serialization manager.
The serialization manager to use to load the theme.
The file path from which to load the theme.
A new <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> loaded from the file path specified using the serialization manager specified.
Loads the theme from the specified file path.
The file path of the theme.
A new <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> loaded from the filename specified.
Loads a theme from the registry.
`LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry` loads
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> loaded from the registry.
Gets the file path from the registry.
The `FilePath` represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
The file path from the registry to the theme.
Gets or sets the name of the theme.
Use the name to uniquely identify the theme among other themes.
The name of the theme.
The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow theme is read-only.
`true` if the workflow theme is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the registry key path for the theme.
Use the registry key to provide a unique place in the Windows registry to save theme information.
The registry key path for the theme.
Saves a theme to a file.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.Save%2A> to persist a theme to a file.
The file in which to save the `WorkflowTheme`.
Saves a theme to the registry.

Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.SaveThemeSettingToRegistry%2A> to save the theme to the registry using the key specified by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.RegistryKeyPath%2A>.
Gets the list of standard themes.
A list of available themes.
Occurs when a theme changes.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ThemeChanged> occurs when properties of the theme changes, or when a theme is loaded.
Gets the type of the theme.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType"></xref> of the theme.
Possible values are `Default`, `System`, and `UserDefined`.
Gets or sets the version of the theme.
Use the version information to indicate successive improvements to a named theme.
The version information for the theme.
The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
Releases the managed resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
